title: StreamDeck Profile Switcher (Razer Synapse)
summary: Exploring a StreamDeck module to switch Razer Synapse profiles (Tartarus Pro + Naga Trinity) quickly and reliably.

title: n8n ⇄ Notion Automation (Search + Update)
summary: Experimenting with a clean workflow for making Notion DBs searchable and updatable via n8n, with safe field mapping and predictable updates.

title: LDAP → LDAPS Proxy + Logging Integrations
summary: Hardened proxy with structured logging (timestamps, inbound/outbound) for syslog platforms and CloudWatch-style pipelines.

title: SaltStack / Ansible Lab Stacks
summary: Building lightweight docker-compose labs that teach automation tooling through runnable examples instead of static docs.

title: TransportDisasters Content Pipeline (Game Visualizations)
summary: Experimenting with a repeatable content pipeline for real-world disaster storytelling using game reenactments and consistent editing presets.
